mxCell.value: iWellCare Healthcare Management System - Entity Relationship Diagram

users
+------------------+
| id: bigint (PK) |
| username: varchar(255) |
| email: varchar(255) |
| password: varchar(255) |
| first_name: varchar(255) |
| last_name: varchar(255) |
| middle_name: varchar(255) |
| date_of_birth: date |
| gender: enum |
| phone_number: varchar(255) |
| street_address: varchar(255) |
| city: varchar(255) |
| state_province: varchar(255) |
| postal_code: varchar(255) |
| country: varchar(255) |
| role: enum |
| is_active: boolean |
| profile_photo: varchar(255) |
| created_at: timestamp |
| updated_at: timestamp |
+------------------+

patients
+------------------+
| id: bigint (PK) |
| user_id: bigint (FK) |
| first_name: varchar(255) |
| last_name: varchar(255) |
| contact: varchar(255) |
| email: varchar(255) |
| address: text |
| date_of_birth: date |
| gender: enum |
| blood_type: varchar(5) |
| emergency_contact: varchar(255) |
| emergency_contact_phone: varchar(255) |
| medical_history: text |
| allergies: text |
| current_medications: text |
| insurance_provider: varchar(255) |
| insurance_number: varchar(255) |
| registration_date: timestamp |
| is_active: boolean |
| created_at: timestamp |
| updated_at: timestamp |
+------------------+

doctors
+------------------+
| id: bigint (PK) |
| user_id: bigint (FK) |
| specialization: varchar(255) |
| license_number: varchar(255) |
| years_of_experience: int |
| qualifications: text |
| bio: text |
| status: enum |
| consultation_fee: decimal(10,2) |
| available_days: json |
| available_hours: json |
| contact_number: varchar(255) |
| emergency_contact: varchar(255) |
| address: text |
| city: varchar(255) |
| state: varchar(255) |
| postal_code: varchar(255) |
| country: varchar(255) |
| created_at: timestamp |
| updated_at: timestamp |
+------------------+

appointments
+------------------+
| id: bigint (PK) |
| patient_id: bigint (FK) |
| doctor_id: bigint (FK) |
| appointment_date: date |
| appointment_time: time |
| type: varchar(255) |
| status: enum |
| notes: text |
| symptoms: text |
| priority: enum |
| duration: int |
| room_number: varchar(255) |
| created_by: bigint (FK) |
| updated_by: bigint (FK) |
| created_at: timestamp |
| updated_at: timestamp |
+------------------+

consultations
+------------------+
| id: bigint (PK) |
| appointment_id: bigint (FK) |
| patient_id: bigint (FK) |
| doctor_id: bigint (FK) |
| consultation_date: date |
| consultation_time: time |
| status: enum |
| chief_complaint: text |
| present_illness: text |
| past_medical_history: text |
| family_history: text |
| social_history: text |
| clinical_measurements: json |
| symptoms: text |
| diagnosis: text |
| treatment_plan: text |
| prescription: text |
| notes: text |
| created_at: timestamp |
| updated_at: timestamp |
+------------------+

medical_records
+------------------+
| id: bigint (PK) |
| patient_id: bigint (FK) |
| doctor_id: bigint (FK) |
| appointment_id: bigint (FK) |
| record_number: varchar(255) |
| record_date: date |
| chief_complaint: varchar(255) |
| present_illness: text |
| past_medical_history: text |
| family_history: text |
| social_history: text |
| review_of_systems: text |
| physical_examination: text |
| diagnosis: text |
| treatment_plan: text |
| medications_prescribed: text |
| lab_results: text |
| imaging_results: text |
| clinical_measurements: text |
| allergies: text |
| notes: text |
| status: enum |
| record_type: enum |
| is_confidential: boolean |
| created_at: timestamp |
| updated_at: timestamp |
+------------------+

prescriptions
+------------------+
| id: bigint (PK) |
| patient_id: bigint (FK) |
| doctor_id: bigint (FK) |
| appointment_id: bigint (FK) |
| prescription_number: varchar(255) |
| prescription_date: date |
| diagnosis: text |
| notes: text |
| instructions: text |
| status: enum |
| valid_until: date |
| is_printed: boolean |
| printed_at: timestamp |
| created_at: timestamp |
| updated_at: timestamp |
+------------------+

billings
+------------------+
| id: bigint (PK) |
| patient_id: bigint (FK) |
| appointment_id: bigint (FK) |
| amount: decimal(10,2) |
| consultation_fee: decimal(10,2) |
| medication_fee: decimal(10,2) |
| laboratory_fee: decimal(10,2) |
| other_fees: decimal(10,2) |
| total_amount: decimal(10,2) |
| status: varchar(255) |
| payment_date: date |
| created_at: timestamp |
| updated_at: timestamp |
+------------------+

inventory
+------------------+
| id: bigint (PK) |
| name: varchar(255) |
| description: text |
| category: enum |
| quantity: int |
| reorder_level: int |
| expiration_date: date |
| unit_price: decimal(10,2) |
| supplier: varchar(255) |
| location: varchar(255) |
| batch_number: varchar(255) |
| notes: text |
| created_by: bigint (FK) |
| updated_by: bigint (FK) |
| last_updated: timestamp |
| is_active: boolean |
| archived: boolean |
| created_at: timestamp |
| updated_at: timestamp |
+------------------+

otp_codes
+------------------+
| id: bigint (PK) |
| email: varchar(255) |
| code: varchar(6) |
| type: enum |
| expires_at: timestamp |
| is_used: boolean |
| created_at: timestamp |
| updated_at: timestamp |
+------------------+

Legend
+------------------+
| Field Name: Primary Key |
| Field Name: Foreign Key |
| Field Name: Regular Field |
+------------------+

Cardinality
1:1 = One-to-One
1:N = One-to-Many
N:M = Many-to-Many
